thread.title: Malcolm-Jamal Warner opens up about Bill Cosby allegations
thread.title_full: Malcolm-Jamal Warner opens up about Bill Cosby allegations

title: Malcolm-Jamal Warner opens up about Bill Cosby allegations
text:
> Entertainment Malcolm-Jamal Warner opens up about Bill Cosby allegations Actor and musician Malcolm-Jamal Warner poses for a portrait Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015, in Los Angeles. Warner, who won his first Grammy earlier this year for his work on Robert Glasper's “Jesus Children,” is currently promoting his new album, “Selfless.” He describes the third record with his band Miles Long as “funky passionate vulnerability.” (Photo by Danny Moloshok/Invision/AP) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team!
